001
002import java.io.BufferedWriter;
003import java.io.File;
004import java.io.FileInputStream;
005import java.io.FileOutputStream;
006import java.io.FileWriter;
007import java.io.InputStream;
008import java.io.PrintStream;
009import java.net.URL;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.Date;
012import java.util.List;
013
014/**
015 * utils
016 *
017 * @author matecsaba
018 */
019public class playerUtil {
020
021    /**
022     * debug net io
023     */
024    public static boolean debugNet = false;
025
026    /**
027     * debug file io
028     */
029    public static boolean debugFile = false;
030
031    /**
032     * debug cache
033     */
034    public static boolean localCache = false;
035
036    /**
037     * days in millis
038     *
039     * @param days days
040     * @return millis
041     */
042    public static long daysInMs(long days) {
043        return days * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000;
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * put one line
048     *
049     * @param s string to write
050     */
051    public static void put(String s) {
052        System.out.println(s);
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * check if key pressed
057     *
058     * @return true if was
059     */
060    public static boolean keyPress() {
061        try {
062            return System.in.available() > 0;
063        } catch (Exception e) {
064            return true;
065        }
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * put out lines
070     *
071     * @param l lines to write
072     */
073    public static void put(playerLyric l) {
074        for (int i = 0; i < l.size(); i++) {
075            put(l.get(i));
076        }
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * get time
081     *
082     * @return time in millis
083     */
084    public static long getTime() {
085        return new Date().getTime();
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * save as
090     *
091     * @param buf buffer to save
092     * @param pat file to overwrite
093     */
094    public static void saveas(playerLyric buf, String pat) {
095        if (debugFile) {
096            put("writing " + pat + "...");
097        }
098        try {
099            FileOutputStream ot = new FileOutputStream(pat, false);
100            PrintStream pr = new PrintStream(ot);
101            for (int i = 0; i < buf.size(); i++) {
102                pr.println(buf.get(i));
103            }
104            pr.flush();
105            pr.close();
106        } catch (Exception e) {
107        }
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * text to binary
112     *
113     * @param lst text
114     * @param mod mode
115     * @return binary
116     */
117    public static byte[] txt2bin(playerLyric lst, int mod) {
118        List<Integer> res = new ArrayList<Integer>();
119        for (int i = 0; i < lst.size(); i++) {
120            byte[] buf = lst.get(i).getBytes();
121            for (int o = 0; o < buf.length; o++) {
122                res.add(buf[o] & 0xff);
123            }
124            switch (mod) {
125                case 13:
126                    res.add(13);
127                    break;
128                case 10:
129                    res.add(10);
130                    break;
131                case 1013:
132                    res.add(10);
133                    res.add(13);
134                    break;
135                case 1310:
136                    res.add(13);
137                    res.add(10);
138                    break;
139            }
140        }
141        byte[] buf = new byte[res.size()];
142        for (int i = 0; i < buf.length; i++) {
143            buf[i] = (byte) ((int) res.get(i));
144        }
145        return buf;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * download one file
150     *
151     * @param pat url
152     * @return downloaded
153     */
154    public static playerLyric download(String pat) {
155        String cache = "cache." + playerLyric.justWords(pat).replaceAll("\\ ", "#");
156        if (localCache) {
157            playerLyric res = readup(cache);
158            if (res != null) {
159                return res;
160            }
161        }
162        if (debugNet) {
163            put("getting " + pat + "...");
164        }
165        try {
166            playerLyric res = doRead(new URL(pat).openStream());
167            if (res == null) {
168                return null;
169            }
170            if (localCache) {
171                saveas(res, cache);
172            }
173            return res;
174        } catch (Exception e) {
175            return null;
176        }
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * html to text
181     *
182     * @param src url
183     * @return text
184     */
185    public static String html2text(String src) {
186        String res = "";
187        for (;;) {
188            int i = src.indexOf("&");
189            if (i < 0) {
190                res += src;
191                break;
192            }
193            res += src.substring(0, i);
194            src = src.substring(i + 1, src.length());
195            i = src.indexOf(";");
196            if (i < 0) {
197                res += src;
198                break;
199            }
200            String a = src.substring(0, i);
201            src = src.substring(i + 1, src.length());
202            if (a.equals("nbsp")) {
203                res += " ";
204                continue;
205            }
206            if (a.equals("lt")) {
207                res += "<";
208                continue;
209            }
210            if (a.equals("gt")) {
211                res += ">";
212                continue;
213            }
214            if (a.equals("amp")) {
215                res += "&";
216                continue;
217            }
218            if (!a.startsWith("#")) {
219                res += "&" + a + ";";
220                continue;
221            }
222            a = a.substring(1, a.length());
223            i = str2int(a);
224            if ((i < 1) || (i > 254)) {
225                res += "&#" + a + ";";
226                continue;
227            }
228            byte[] buf = new byte[1];
229            buf[0] = (byte) (i & 0xff);
230            res += new String(buf);
231        }
232        return res.trim();
233    }
234
235    /**
236     * string to integer
237     *
238     * @param s string
239     * @return integer
240     */
241    public static int str2int(String s) {
242        try {
243            return Integer.parseInt(s);
244        } catch (Exception e) {
245            return 0;
246        }
247    }
248
249    /**
250     * sleep some time without wakeups
251     *
252     * @param msec time
253     */
254    public static void sleep(int msec) {
255        if (msec < 1) {
256            return;
257        }
258        try {
259            synchronized (sleeper) {
260                sleeper.wait(msec);
261            }
262        } catch (Exception e) {
263        }
264    }
265
266    private final static Object sleeper = new Object();
267
268    /**
269     * html to text
270     *
271     * @param src url
272     * @return text
273     */
274    public static playerLyric html2text(playerLyric src) {
275        playerLyric res = new playerLyric();
276        if (src == null) {
277            return res;
278        }
279        String cur = "";
280        for (int i = 0; i < src.size(); i++) {
281            cur += src.get(i);
282            for (;;) {
283                int o = cur.indexOf("<");
284                if (o < 0) {
285                    if (cur.length() < 1) {
286                        break;
287                    }
288                    res.add("1" + html2text(cur));
289                    cur = "";
290                    break;
291                }
292                if (o > 0) {
293                    res.add("1" + html2text(cur.substring(0, o)));
294                }
295                cur = cur.substring(o, cur.length());
296                o = cur.indexOf(">");
297                if (o < 0) {
298                    break;
299                }
300                String s = cur.substring(1, o).trim();
301                if (s.endsWith("/")) {
302                    s = s.substring(0, s.length() - 1);
303                }
304                s = s.replaceAll("  ", " ").trim().toLowerCase();
305                res.add("2" + s);
306                cur = cur.substring(o + 1, cur.length());
307            }
308        }
309        if (cur.length() > 0) {
310            res.add("1" + html2text(cur));
311        }
312        return res;
313    }
314
315    /**
316     * read up file
317     *
318     * @param pat pathname
319     * @return text
320     */
321    public static playerLyric readup(String pat) {
322        if (debugFile) {
323            put("reading " + pat + "...");
324        }
325        try {
326            File fil = new File(pat);
327            long tim = fil.lastModified();
328            playerLyric res = doRead(new FileInputStream(pat));
329            if (res == null) {
330                return null;
331            }
332            res.modified = tim;
333            return res;
334        } catch (Exception e) {
335            return null;
336        }
337    }
338
339    /**
340     * append one line
341     *
342     * @param fn file name
343     * @param ln line
344     */
345    public static void append(String fn, String ln) {
346        try {
347            BufferedWriter f = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(fn, true));
348            f.append(ln + "\n");
349            f.close();
350        } catch (Exception e) {
351        }
352    }
353
354    /**
355     * read up stream
356     *
357     * @param reader stream to read
358     * @return text
359     */
360    public static playerLyric doRead(InputStream reader) {
361        playerLyric res = new playerLyric();
362        String ln = "";
363        int pr = -1;
364        for (;;) {
365            int i;
366            try {
367                i = reader.read();
368            } catch (Exception e) {
369                break;
370            }
371            if (i < 0) {
372                break;
373            }
374            int prv = pr;
375            pr = i;
376            switch (i) {
377                case 10:
378                case 13:
379                    if (prv == (23 - i)) {
380                        pr = -1;
381                        break;
382                    }
383                    res.add(ln);
384                    ln = "";
385                    break;
386                default:
387                    byte[] buf = new byte[1];
388                    buf[0] = (byte) i;
389                    ln += new String(buf);
390                    break;
391            }
392        }
393        if (ln.length() > 0) {
394            res.add(ln);
395        }
396        try {
397            reader.close();
398        } catch (Exception e) {
399        }
400        return res;
401    }
402
403}
